nodes.text: Yara Grugara: Unauthorized and Totally Real
Yara Grugara: Unauthorized and Totally Real was a documentary that was made during the time of the Clone Wars, about the reporter Yara Grugara.

The documentary was about three hours long and was produced by Armistice Gluuc-Brendlheim. It was unauthorized by Grugara and was very critical of her, portraying her as being spiteful, immature and self-serving.
